quote: Replace the word algorithm with audience. Say no, my audience didn't like it.
why_clipworthy: It reframes how agents should view social media performance.
suggested_hook: Are you blaming the algorithm for poor engagement? Think again.

quote: If you do anything once a day for long enough, you'll build a habit.
why_clipworthy: Encourages consistency and habit-building in content creation.
suggested_hook: Want to master social media? Start with this simple habit.
